Welcome to FlaskApp’s documentation!¶

API documentation¶

Summary¶

class myapp.Createtask(api=None, *args, **kwargs)¶
post()¶

Adds a new task to celery taskqueue to find factorial of number given in this post request

Example curl Request: curl -X POST “http://127.0.0.1:5000/calculate_factorial” -H “accept: application/json” -H “Content-Type: application/json” -d “{ “number”: 10000}”

host: localhost Accept: application/json

Response:

“task sent”

Response headers: content-length: 12 content-type: application/json date: Sun, 10 Nov 2019 01:27:58 GMT server: Werkzeug/0.16.0 Python/3.7.3

class myapp.Getstatus(api=None, *args, **kwargs)¶
get(task_id)¶

Returns status of a task from MYSQL db given the task_id

–Example Request–

..sourcecode:: http

GET/get_task_status/{task_id} host: localhost Accept: task_id(string)

–Example Response–

..sourcecode:: http

content-length: 10 content-type: application/json date: Sun, 10 Nov 2019 01:27:23 GMT server: Werkzeug/0.16.0 Python/3.7.3

[“SUCCESS”]
